a chain of standard length for measuring land.

an eatable made of the meat (flesh of animals), taken while drinking liquors.
the organ of sight; the eye.
love that occurs in a person for another at the first sight.
a snake, which is believed to use its eyes as its ears.

that can be seen.
knowledge got from seeing.

pleasing to the eyes; beautiful; lovely; charming.

a piece taken out from a whole, by breaking.

to bite and grind or crush with the teeth; to masticate; to chew.
crop grown with vigour and in abundance.
luxuriant growth of crops.
(correctly, ಚ ತು) (fig.) the exact words or said or exact meaning of what is said; (used only in the phrase 'ಚಚು ತಪ್ಪದೆ' meaning (something being carried out) exactly as told or ordered.
the Brahminee kite, Haliastur indus, an accipitrine bird with long, pointed wings, forked tail and white neck.
(myth.) the king of birds, which is used by Viṣṇu as his vehicle.
a maintaining of the tempo, and measuring it by the beats of one's foot or feet.
the verbal condemnation; harshly or coarsely insulting language; a scolding; abuse.
= ಚಚ್ಚಗೊಟ್ಟಿ.
the quality of being quick, swift, prompt, etc.; quickness; swiftness.
the quality of being thoughtful, cautious; carefulness; meticulousness.
(acting, reacting, thinking etc.) quickly, meticulously or cautiously.
to become cautious; to take precautions; to be meticulous.

a man who acts, thinks swiftly.
a man who acts cautiously, carefully.
a man who acts impetuously or with little reason.
disorderly; unsystematically.
lack o order, system.
the behaviour of a person characterised by this.
to cause to be crushed, pounded, beaten.
to strike with a crushing or smashing blow; to beat heavily; to bash.
to become dented or deformed by being beaten up heavily.
to lose zeal or enthusiasm.
to carry a child on the flank of the body.
a kind of bird (= small owl) supposed to give indication of what will happen in future.
a heavy rain.
a perfect square.
an area of one square mile.
a horizontal architectural crosspiece, projecting outside, supporting the weight above an opening, as a window or a door.
a horizontal crosspiece projecting from an inside wall of a house, at a convenient height, used as a shelf for keeping things.
the top covering of a building; a roof.
he millet Pennisetum typhoides (= Holcus spicata, = Panicum spicatum) of Poaceae family.
its millet used as food; spiked millet, pearl millet.
a thing for sleeping or resting on; a piece of furniture consisting usu. of a bedstead, bedspring, mattress, and bedding; a bed.
a room with a bed, for sleeping in; a bed-room.
a corridor projecting forward, usu. almost open on three sides on the floor or floors above the ground floor.
a rigid support from below or side; a prop or buttress.
a small casket in which the linga (a solid image of Śiva) is kept and hung round the neck with a string or thread.
an onomatopoetic term used to express swiftness, quickness in action.
obsession - a) the fact or state of being obsessed with an idea, desire, emotion, etc. b) such a persistent idea, desire, emotion, etc., esp. one that cannot be got rid of by reasoning.
an onomatopoetic term used to represent the sound of a dry stick breaking.
the passerine bird Passer domesticus of Passerinae family, with brown and grey plumage; house-sparrow.
a blade of the sacred grass (Desmodium tripinnata of Poaceae family) used to represent or substitute a brāhmaṇa.
a ceremony marking the death anniversary of a person, in which a ಚಟಕ (see ಚಟಕ1 above) is substituted for a brāhmaṇa.
to cut, knock off, asunder.
a female house-sparrow.
all of a sudden; suddenly.
a man having an obsession.
to have an obsession.

swiftly; quickly.

a measure, one sixteenth of a seer.
a particular way of wielding one's sword, in a sword-fight.
the root of the vine Piper longum, used for medicinal purpose.

beauty; loveliness; pleasing quality.
rapid rhythmic back and forth movement; quivering; vibration.

rapidity in moving, going, travelling, proceeding or performing; swiftness.

a surface, horizontal plane that is perfectly or almost flat and even.
the basic skeletal framework supporting a structure, as the horizontal frame of a bullock-cart, cot, etc.
a portable, wooden or metal framework, for carrying a corpse; a bier.
a rule ordinance either by religious or social, to regulate the conduct of persons of a society; a regulation.
neatness in appearance, ways, etc.; orderliness; tidiness.
a cloth used to cover the top of a palanquin.
an unripe fruit.
the quality of being hard, strong.
a processed dry fruit.

the matter that settles to the bottom of a liquid; lees; dregs; sediment.
anything that sapless or useless.
a man excellent in a particular class or field of action.
a boy or man who is being taught under the supervision of a teacher; a pupil; a disciple.
to prepare a portable frame for carrying a the body of a dead person; to make a bier; to arrange for anothers' funeral.
an extent of land given to a teacher for the sustenance of his disciples.
a kind of spicy relish; ಚಟ್ಟಣಿ ಮಾಡು caṭni māḍu to break down (something or someone) completely; to demolish.

the state of being excessive or abundant.
an earthen vessel.

a round earthenware with a constricted neck and a small mouth; a pot.
a kind of dry cake made of the coarse flour of rice, black gram (pulse of phaseolus mungo), etc.
a screen made by weaving thin strips of bamboo, used as a partition wall, screen, etc.
a temporary shelter made using this supported on poles.
a flat, coarse mat made of woven or plaited strips of bamboo, used for sitting on.
a screen made of bamboo strips, used as a door.
a basket made of thin strips of bamboo.
a colony of bees; a beehive.
a flat, broad, metal plate used by soldiers, policemen to ward of blows or missiles; a shield.
a temporary shed made using grass, hay, etc. for wayfarers.
the sixth day of a lunar fortnight.

the merchant community.
a male member of this community.
a merchant.
a prominent member in the society.
to drop, bow one's head (as in shame, disappointment, etc.).

the fact or state of being destroyed; a falling down; a downfall.

a tract of land having pebbles, small irregular pieces of stones mixed with the soil.
an impression of one's palm, that is smeared with a colour, imprinted on a wall, esp. the one made by a girl who has just reached the stage of puberty.
a smearing of a perfume or perfumes on the body.
a reproducing of a thing as it is; copying.
a particular type of hold, grapple in wrestling.
a man who anoints, perfumes another with perfume, fragrance, etc.

a year in which comparatively more (land) revenue is received by the state exchequer.
a raised, level structure (as a platform) constructed close to the front wall of the house, usu. on both sides of the main entrance, used as a sit-out.
a feeling of discontent and ill will because of another's advantages, possessions, etc.; resentful dislike of another who has something that one desires; envy; enviousness.

a violent, intense attack; an onslaught.

the act of going up, rising or being elevated; an advancement in degree, position, rank, value etc.

the quality of being characterised by excess; excessiveness; plentifulness.
the quality of being forceful, vehement or violent.

a long, slender stick (as of rattan or of other twig) used to strike (with force), esp. to punish someone or drive an animal.
a projection at the bottom (as of an idol) made to fit into a corresponding cavity in the base to fix it (as the idol) firmly.
a particular type of lock in wrestling to overpower the opponent.
the state of two wooden pieces being joined together firmly by inserting a tenon of one piece into the mortise of another.
being too much or too great; immoderate; excessive.
higher, immoderately high cost or price.

short, loose trousers reaching partway to the knee; shorts.
an outer garment, esp. for men and boys, extending from the waist generally to the ankles, and divided into separate coverings for the legs; pants; trousers.

a game of skill played by two players on a chessboard, each with 16 pieces limited in movement according to kind, the object being to checkmate the opponenṭs king; chess.

(astrol.) the fourth and eighth houses from one's birth house (in the horoscope).

(dance.) a posture of hands in which the upper arm is thrown outwards at the breast level, the hands brought to the breast with the forefinger and middle finger are bent to touch the tip of the thumb, while the little finger and ring-finger are bent but slight raised (depicting holding a garland).
(as plane figure) to be bound by four sides and four angles.
a kind of small vessel used for drinking the juice of sōma plant in religious sacrifices.

a man not having the power of sight; a blind man.

Brahma, the Creator of the universe, who is conceived as having four faces.
a man characterised by cleverness and wit.
the plant Fumaria indica (= F. parviflora) of Fumariaceae family; fumitory.

a speech, statement, remark that is intelligent, clever, apt, witty, etc.

four times; four-fold.

doubled twice; increased by four times.

constituting a quarter; equal to a quarter.

any of the four equal parts of something; a quarter.
the fourth day after the full moon-day or new moon-day.
(gram.) the dative case (corresponding to the case expressed by the preposition 'to' of English).

Airāvata, the celestial elephant used as a vehicle by Indra, the chief of gods.
totalling to fourteen.
preceded by, occurring or being after, thirteen others in a series; fourteenth.
the cardinal number fourteen; 14.

a poem, properly expressive of a single, complete thought, idea or sentiment, consisting of fourteen lines; a sonnet.
= ಚತುರ್ದಶಲೋಕ.
(pl. withಗಳು) the fourteen successive mythical progenitors and sovereigns of the earth.

(myth.) (pl.withಗಳು) the fourteen persons or things generated while churning the cosmic oceans - Lakṣmi, Kaustubha, Pārijāta, sure, Dhanvantri, Candra (the moon), Kāmadhēnu, Airāvata, celestial female dancers, Ucchaiśravassu, poison, Śanka (a conch), ambrosia, Śaraŋga (the bow of Viṣṇu).

(jain.) the seven persons or animals (gřhapati, sēnāpati, śilpi, purōhita, a woman, an elephant, and a horse) and seven nonliving thing (a circular missile, a sword, an umbrella, a spectre, a gem, skin, and a cowrie) a Jaina emperor is bestowed with.
(myth.) (pl. withಗಳು) the fourteen worlds (including the earth).
the fourteenth day after the full moon-day or new moon-day.
(pl.) the four main points of the compass (east, south, west and north).
a complete army consisting of the four divisions - elephants, chariots, cavalry and infantry.
(jain.) (pl.) the four kinds of devotion (devotion to the jina, teacher, bahuśruta bhakti and śruta bhakti).
any of the four goals of Hindu life, they being ಅರ್ಥ (economic activities), ಕಾಮ (pleasure and desire), ಧರ್ಮ (righteousness) and ಮೋಕ್ಷ ( liberation or emancipation).
(pl.) four arms (as of a deity).
he who has four arms (as a deity).
Viṣṇu.
(fig.) a married man.
she who has four arms (as a goddess).
four times; four-fold.
the four times the quantity, number. etc.
(pl.) existence, thought, joy and the soul.
Brahma, the Creator of the universe, who is conceived as having four faces.
a man characterised by cleverness and wit.
(jain.).
(pl.) the four ages of the world, of long mundane period of years.

the four social classes of Hindu society - brahmaṇa, kṣatriya, vaiśya and śudra.
= ಚತುರ್ಬಲ.
totalling to twenty four.
the cardinal number twenty four; 24.
of four types, ways, etc.
(pl.) four types, ways.
(pl.) the four kinds of beings (classified based on their births, born from sweat, egg, earth (as plants) and womb (as viviparous animals).

(pl.) the four kinds of emancipation of the soul - being in the same world as the deity worshipped, being close to the Supreme Being, attaining the same form as of the deity worshipped, and becoming one with the Supreme Being.
= ಚತುರ್ವಿಧಪದ.
(pl.) the four types of musical instruments - stringed instruments (as violin, veeṇe, etc.), percussion instruments, instruments made of bronze (as a cymbal, bell, gong, etc.) and wind instruments.
(pl.) the four types of food - cooked food, drinks, esculents (as vegetables), and that which is eaten by licking.
(pl.) the four vēdas - Řgvēda, Yajurvēda, Sāmavēda and Atharvaṇavēda.
a man who has studied and is well versed with all the four Vēdas.
a young cow of four years old (that has not yet calved).
the central space of a building, usu. without a roof.
an aggregate of four things, persons, animals, etc.
the central space of a building, usu. without a roof.
the four negative qualities of the mind - wrath, self-prestige, illusion and greediness.
(pl. with ಗಳು) (mus.) the four successive tempos, the second, third, and fouth ones running at twice the speed of its previous one.
(pl. with ಗಳು) the four corners (as of a building).
a plane geometrical figure with four angles (bound by four sides).
consisting, made of four components; having or including four things, persons, etc.
having four times as much or as many; four-fold.
a group of four persons, animals, things, etc.
a place where four roads meet or where two roads intersect each other.
any animal with four feet (as a cow).

any metrical verse having four lines.
a school where all the four Vēdas are taught.
= ಚತುರ್ವೇದಿ.
= ಚತುಷ್ಪದ.
= ಚತುಷ್ಪದ.
totalling sixty four.
the cardinal number sixty four; 64.
the sixty-four accomplishments or arts that covers almost all spheres of human activities.
= ಚತುಷ್ಕಷಾಯ.
(pl. with ಗಳು) the four religious cults - ಮಾಹೇಶ್ವರ, ವೈಷ್ಣವ, ಬೌದ್ಧ and ಜೈನ.
the entire water body that is encircling the land on all the sides.
(pl.) all the four frontiers (as of a village, country, etc.).
(pl. with ಗಳು) the four principal tastes - acrid, bitter, acidic and astringent.
a brownish cow.

an archaic kind of poetical composition.
a thin, long piece of cloth for decorating a palanquin.
a building where shelter (sometimes food also) provided benevolently to people, esp. wayfarers.

a light, small, portable, usu. half-spheric cover for protection from rain or sun, consisting of a fabric held on a collapsible frame of thin ribs radiating from the top of a stick or handle; an umbrella.
the letter 'ಚ' usu. pronounced with the vowel 'ಅ'.
